org.treetank.access
Class WriteTransaction

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.access.ReadTransaction
      org.treetank.access.WriteTransaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
IReadTransaction, IWriteTransaction
public class WriteTransaction
extends ReadTransaction
implements IWriteTransaction

WriteTransaction

Single-threaded instance of only write transaction per session.

All methods throw NullPointerExceptions in case of null values for reference parameters.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

WriteTransaction

protected WriteTransaction(long paramTransactionID,
                           Session paramSessionState,
                           WriteTransactionState paramTransactionState,
                           int paramMaxNodeCount,
                           int paramMaxTime)
                    throws org.treetank.exception.TTIOException,
                           org.treetank.exception.TTUsageException
Constructor.

Parameters:
paramTransactionID - ID of transaction
paramSessionState - state of the session
paramTransactionState - state of this transaction
paramMaxNodeCount - maximum number of node modifications before auto commit
paramMaxTime - maximum number of seconds before auto commit
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.TTIOException - if the reading of the props is failing
org.treetank.exception.TTUsageException - if paramMaxNodeCount < 0 or paramMaxTime < 0

remove

public void remove()
            throws org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException
Remove currently selected node. This does automatically remove descendants. The cursor is located at the former right sibling. If there was no right sibling, it is located at the former left sibling. If there was no left sibling, it is located at the former parent.

Specified by:
remove in interface IWriteTransaction
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException - if node couldn't be removed

revertTo

public void revertTo(long paramRevision)
              throws org.treetank.exception.TTUsageException,
                     org.treetank.exception.TTIOException
Reverting all changes to the revision defined. This command has to be finalized with a commit. A revert is always bound to a IReadTransaction.moveToDocumentRoot().

Specified by:
revertTo in interface IWriteTransaction
Parameters:
paramRevision - revert to the revision
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.TTUsageException - if paramRevision < 0 or paramRevision > maxCommitedRev
org.treetank.exception.TTIOException - if an I/O operation fails

commit

public void commit()
            throws org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException
Commit all modifications of the exclusive write transaction. Even commit if there are no modification at all.

Specified by:
commit in interface IWriteTransaction
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException - if this revision couldn't be commited

close

public void close()
           throws org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException
Close shared read transaction and immediately release all resources. This is an idempotent operation and does nothing if the transaction is already closed.

Specified by:
close in interface IReadTransaction
Specified by:
close in interface IWriteTransaction

close in class ReadTransaction
Throws:
